text: Ra uniharula'i dharmako barema spasta pramanaharu pradana garyaum, ani uniharule juna vivada gare, (tyo) jnana a'isake pascata apasi jyadatiko karanale gare. Niscaya nai timro palanakarta kiyamatako dina uniharubica ti kurako barema phaisala garidinecha, jasama uniharu apasama vivada garirakheka chan
